name: Ceasefire
text: After the **splitgold** player activates a system that contains 1 or more of your units: The **splitgold** player cannot move units to the active system. Then return this card to the **splitgold** player.

name: Political Secret
text: When an agenda is revealed: The **splitgold** player cannot vote, play action cards, or use faction abilities until after that agenda has been resolved. Then, return this card to the **splitgold** player.

name: Support for the Throne
text: When you receive this card, if you are not the **splitgold** player, you must place it faceup in your play area and gain 1 victory point. When you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the **splitgold** player's units, or if the **splitgold** player is eliminated, lose 1 victory point and return this card to the **splitgold** player.

name: Trade Agreement
text: When the **splitgold** player replenishes commodities: The **splitgold** player gives you all of their commodities. Then, return this card to the **splitgold** player.

name: Alliance
text: When you receive this card, if you are not the **splitgold** player, you must place it faceup in your play area. While this card is in your play area, you can use the **splitgold** player's commander ability, if it is unlocked. When you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the **splitgold** player's units, return this card to the **splitgold** player.

text: When you receive this card, if you are not the **orange** player, you must place it faceup in your play area and gain 1 victory point. When you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the **orange** player's units, or if the **orange** player is eliminated, lose 1 victory point and return this card to the **orange** player.

name: Trade Agreement
text: When the **orange** player replenishes commodities: The **orange** player gives you all of their commodities. Then, return this card to the **orange** player.

name: Alliance
text: When you receive this card, if you are not the **orange** player, you must place it faceup in your play area. While this card is in your play area, you can use the **orange** player's commander ability, if it is unlocked. When you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the **orange** player's units, return this card to the **orange** player.

name: Ceasefire
text: After the **ethereal** player activates a system that contains 1 or more of your units: The **ethereal** player cannot move units to the active system. Then return this card to the **ethereal** player.

name: Political Secret
text: When an agenda is revealed: The **ethereal** player cannot vote, play action cards, or use faction abilities until after that agenda has been resolved. Then, return this card to the **ethereal** player.

name: Support for the Throne
text: When you receive this card, if you are not the **ethereal** player, you must place it faceup in your play area and gain 1 victory point. When you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the **ethereal** player's units, or if the **ethereal** player is eliminated, lose 1 victory point and return this card to the **ethereal** player.

name: Trade Agreement
text: When the **ethereal** player replenishes commodities: The **ethereal** player gives you all of their commodities. Then, return this card to the **ethereal** player.

name: Alliance
text: When you receive this card, if you are not the **ethereal** player, you must place it faceup in your play area. While this card is in your play area, you can use the **ethereal** player's commander ability, if it is unlocked. When you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the **ethereal** player's units, return this card to the **ethereal** player.
